title: HOUR 2 - Yogi Roth
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Yogi Roth
description:
In this hour of The Herd, it's another edition of "Where Colin Was Right, Where Colin Was Wrong." Later, Colin gets a visit from Pac-12 Networks college football analyst Yogi Roth, who shares his observations on Lincoln Riley's first game as head coach of USC, Ohio State's offensive struggles and Oregon's poor showing against Georgia.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
